content.raw: For example, for a robot like atlas, any of the robot's joints `Joint::GetParent()` will return an empty pointer, but we expect each (except pelvis) of the links in the robot to have a parent link.  [Example test usage](#!/osrf/gazebo/src/2b4fea039504251bb85fea890906971784f37829/test/integration/physics.cc#cl-1644), without this fix, `parent` is `NULL` in this test except for the joints that attach each foot to the world.
content.html: For example, for a robot like atlas, any of the robot's joints Joint::GetParent() will return an empty pointer, but we expect each (except pelvis) of the links in the robot to have a parent link. Example test usage, without this fix, parent is NULL in this test except for the joints that attach each foot to the world.
